dishes.dish_description: Tiger prawns marinated in kasundi, grilled, and paired with cucumber, tomato, onion, peppers, lettuce, and rustic bread cubes, all dressed in vinaigrette.
A platter consisting of premium chicken kebab, hummus, Baba ganoush, muhammara, tzatziki, marinated olives with feta cheese, tabbouleh, and freshly baked pita bread.
Inhouse baked bun layered with Indian-spiced lamb patty, fried onions, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and served with fries.
Genuine Neapolitan dough topped with homemade herb tomato sauce, topped with grilled, seasonal exotic veggies, and mozzarella.
Genuine Neapolitan dough with spread of Bianca sauce, pork bacon, olives, and cheese.
Genuine Neapolitan dough featuring homemade herb tomato sauce, topped with mozzarella and pork pepperoni.
Pasta with vegetables in a zesty tomato sauce, topped with parmesan cheese, served with a side of garlic bread.
A platter comprising mince mutton kabob, hummus, Baba ganoush, muhammara, marinated olives with feta cheese, tabbouleh, tzatziki, and freshly baked pita bread.

A classic pasta dish hailing from Naples, featuring the rich flavors of finely sautéed garlic, olive oil, and chili flakes, sundried tomatoes, black olives, adorned with parsley and parmesan. Served with garlic bread on the side.
Pasta with a blend of cheese and tomato sauces, mixed with vegetables, parmesan cheese, and served with garlic bread on the side.
A gently crafted Arborio rice dish showcasing an assortment of mushrooms and Parmesan cheese, delivering a creamy texture.
A platter consisting of falafel, hummus, Baba ganoush, muhammara, tzatziki, marinated olives with feta cheese, tabbouleh, and freshly baked pita bread.
A gently crafted Arborio rice prepared in a cheese sauce with prawns, asparagus, and a touch of lemon zest.
Batter-fried river sole fish served with crispy French fries and a zesty jalapeno tartar sauce.
A platter consisting of 3 pcs of premium grilled tiger prawns, tabbouleh, hummus, tzatziki, muhammara, marinated olives with feta, Baba ganoush, and freshly baked pita bread.
A sophisticated and decadent layered Italian dessert.
Classical cinnamon spiced carrot cake layered with orange and cream cheese frosting.
A portion of premium cheesecake accompanied by a drizzle of blueberry coulis.
A portion of premium cheesecake accompanied by drizzle of strawberry coulis.
Cool down this summer with a refreshing virgin orange basil mojito! It's made with fresh orange chunk, basil, and fresh orange juice top up with soda.
Cucumber mint cooler is a refreshing summer beverage with a fantastic combination of cucumber and mint leaves and top up with soda.
